title: Collecting Capture
body: Below is a scenario that will allow you to work though the Collection process.  Give it a go and put what you've learned into practice.

_incomplete.label: Click/Press the button below to start the scenario

scenarioBody: You have been made responsible by your manager to pick the Click & Collect orders and you are carrying a Pet Pad whilst you are putting out stock. You hear a ‘ping’ from the PetPad. Follow through and complete the Pick process for the oldest order.

_instructions.body:
You have just been called over to the tills as Fran Ike has a Click & Collect collection. Her order number is 22008952. You go in the back of the store and bring her order to her.


Complete the collection on OneStock.

_feedback.incorrect: The user or the password is incorrect
_feedback.incorrectSecondAttempt: The user or the password is incorrect - look at the green box at the bottom for the details
_feedback.incorrectThirdAttempt: The user or the password is incorrect - look at the green box at the bottom for the details. They need to be entered exactly as they are shown.

_items.feedback: This opens the 'Bag' tab - try another button

_instructions.body: The customer has said that they no longer want the bone chews. Mark these appropriately and mark the rest of the item as collected.

_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here
_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 1
Collect 2
_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_items.name: Bag 2
_items.feedback: This opens the 'Bag' tab - try another button
We don't want to mark the whole order as collected.
_items.name: Collected 1
Collected 2

_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here

_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here

_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 4
_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here

_items.feedback: This will mark the entire order as having an issue. The customer only has an issue with one part of the order.

_items.name: Collect Issue 3
_items.feedback: This isn't the part of the order the customer has an issue with
This is not this customer's order

Cancel - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: Don't cancel - you've almost marked the item correctly
This is the wrong option for this situation

_items.feedback: This is the wrong option for this situation
_items.name: Collect 2 - Plus 3
Collect 2 - Plus 4
_items.feedback: This is the wrong option for this situation

_items.name: Cancel - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: Don't cancel - you've almost marked the item correctly
Don't remove this - we want to make this item as no longer wanted
We don't need to use this here.
_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 1
Collect 2
_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_items.name: Bag 2
_items.feedback: This opens the 'Bag' tab - try another button

_items.name: Collected 2
_items.feedback: This is not this customer's order.

_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 2
_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here.

_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 3
_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here.

_items.name: Collected Up Arrow 4
_items.feedback: We don't need to use this here.

_items.feedback: This will mark the entire order as having an issue. The customer only has an issue with one part of the order.

_completionDialog.dialogBody: Great work! you've completed that scenario - you've shown you know how to process a collection.

title: Picking Capture
body: Below is a scenario that will allow you to work though the Picking process.  Give it a go and put what you've learned into practice.

_incomplete.label: Click/Press the button below to start the scenario

scenarioBody: You have been made responsible by your manager to pick the Click & Collect orders and you are carrying a Pet Pad whilst you are putting out stock. You hear a ‘ping’ from the PetPad. Follow through and complete the Pick process for the oldest order.

_instructions.body: Hi, Welcome to this scenario. If at any point you need reminding of the scenario, just press/click the '+' icon that will appear in the top corner.
The green box at the bottom will guide you on what to click/press or type. Check out this box on each screen for guidance. Good luck.

_feedback.incorrect: The user or the password is incorrect
_feedback.incorrectSecondAttempt: The user or the password is incorrect - look at the green box at the bottom for the details
_feedback.incorrectThirdAttempt: The user or the password is incorrect - look at the green box at the bottom for the details. They need to be entered exactly as they are shown.

_screens.title: Home Page 2
_screens.directions: Remember, you're doing a pick, so head for the right section.

_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
_items.name: Collect Button 1

_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_items.name: Start Preparation
_items.feedback: We need to process the oldest order first. Oldest orders are at the top.
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
We need to process the oldest order first. Oldest orders are at the top.
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
We need to process the oldest order first. Oldest orders are at the top.

Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_instructions.body:
Well done - so, this is the oldest order and needs to be picked first.


Use the OneStock App to process this corectly. Follow the green guidance box at the bottom for what order to process this in.

_items.feedback: Pick and process the dog chews first, as you have come to this item before the Hills dog food
_items.name: Hills Pick

_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_screens.title: Sub Bag 6

_instructions.body: There appears to be 3 bags of stock on the shelf, perfect, but it looks like one bag is torn. Process the order in OneStock.

_screens.directions: Add the products that are available first.

_items.feedback: This option won't add the available products.
_items.name: Unavailable - Hills

_screens.title: Sub Bag 7

_instructions.body: Great, all of the dog chews are available to pick. Process this in OneStock.

_screens.directions: Add the 4 chews that you have picked.

_feedback.incorrect: Sorry, you've clicked on a function that won't help you to do what you need to do.
_feedback.incorrectSecondAttempt: Sorry, you've clicked on a function that won't help you to do what you need to do. Please follow the guidance in the green box at the bottom.
_feedback.incorrectThirdAttempt:
Remember these are the key functions:


  • Unavailable: Allows you to mark an item as 'Unavailable'
  • Manual adding: Allows you to mark an item as picked.

_items.feedback: All of the dog chews are available on the shelf to pick.
_items.name: Unavailable - Hills
Submit - Billy & Margot x
_items.feedback: Don't submit this yet as all 4 items are available to pick.
You don't want to remove this item as all 4 items are available to pick.

_items.name: Submit - Billy & Margot x
_items.feedback: Don't submit this yet as all 4 items are available to pick.
You don't want to remove this item as all 4 items are available to pick.

_items.name: Submit - Billy & Margot x
_items.feedback: Don't submit this yet as all 4 items are available to pick.
You don't want to remove this item as all 4 items are available to pick.

_items.name: Sub Bag 14 - Minus
_items.feedback: You don't want to remove this item as all 4 items are available to pick.
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_screens.title: Sub Bag 21
_screens.directions: Add the 2 products that are available to pick.

_items.feedback: Don't cancel, you haven't added the products to the pick yet.
_items.name: Cancel - Billy & Margot

_items.feedback: Don't cancel out of this just yet. You still need to add the correct amount of products you have picked.
_items.name: Cancel - Billy & Margot

_items.feedback: Don't Submit the manual pick just yet. There are 2 of this product on the shelf and in a saleable condition.
You don't want to remove the item. 2 of these items are available on the shelves to pick.
Don't cancel out of this just yet. You still need to add the correct amount of products you have picked.
_items.name: Cancel - Billy & Margot
Plus - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: You don't want to remove the item. ONLY 2 of these items are available on the shelves to pick.
You don't want to remove the item. 2 of these items are available on the shelves to pick.

_screens.title: Sub Bag 24
_screens.directions: Now mark the products that re unavailable

_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_screens.title: Sub Bag 25
_screens.directions: Now mark the torn bag as unavailable.

_items.name: Manual adding - Hills
_items.feedback: You have already manually added the two products were available. The 3rd product on the shelf is damaged and should be marked appropriately.
Don't cancel out until you mark the required product unavailable.
_items.name: Cancel - Hills

_items.feedback: Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
We only use 'Stock not available' if the stock does not exist in the store. In this case, the stock exists, but it is damaged.
Don't cancel out until you mark the damaged item as unavailable.
_items.name: Cancel - Billy & Margot
Sub Bag 28 - Plus 1 - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: Don't increase the number. Only one of the items is damaged, so we need to record this.

_items.name: Sub Bag 28 - Plus 2 - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: We only use 'Stock not available' if the stock does not exist in the store. In this case, the stock exists, but it is damaged.

_items.name: Sub Bag 28 - Minus 1 - Billy & Margot
_items.feedback: Don't reduce the number. One of the items is damaged, so we need to record this.
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab

_items.name: Complete Preparation Sub Bag 30
_items.feedback: We need to process the oldest order first. Oldest orders are at the top.
Sorry, that's not the right button - this open the 'Collect' tab
Don't cancel off now - There's just a few clicks until this order is finished being picked.

_screens.title: Print Screen 1

_instructions.body: Now you need to print the Dispatch note.

_screens.directions: Click/Press on the button that looks like a box with an arrow pointing upwards (in the top right corner)

_items.feedback: Don't close the tab - you'll lose the Dispatch Note
_items.name: Window close button 1
Window close button 2
_items.feedback: Don't close the tab - you'll lose the Dispatch Note

_items.name: Sub Bag 32 Cancel
_items.feedback: Don't cancel off now - Almost Done!

_completionDialog.dialogBody:
Great work! you've completed that scenario - you're all set for picking an order.


Remember - because you've marked an item as 'Damaged' it needs to be removed from sale and written off on Store Wastage, using the reason code 'Damaged in Store'. The next course will discuss Stock File management in more detail.
